body_html:
Just to add more information to the discussion, in slurm one can explicitly say to assign jobs to nodes with GPU's. I've observed that the apparent "stalling" only happens when jobs are sent to machine that are suppose to be CPU only.

If the machine is artificially restricted to only use CPU but tensorflow detects GPUs, can tensorflow accidentally get stuck?
